function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential bias in the literature review process due to authors' idiosyncratic decisions","Impact":"Inaccurate or skewed representation of research approaches and challenges","Mitigation":"Use of standardized protocol and review process to reduce bias","Technologies":"Standardized review protocols and guidelines for literature review","People":"Authors, researchers","Owner":"Researchers, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Inconsistency in the search process when collecting and identifying research papers","Impact":"Failure to capture relevant literature and research output","Mitigation":"Implementation of standardized search strategies and consistent search criteria","Technologies":"Search engines with advanced filtering and data visualization tools","People":"Researchers, academic institutions","Owner":"Researchers, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Limitation of search to peer-reviewed journals may exclude relevant literature and research output from other sources","Impact":"Missed opportunities to capture valuable insights and data from non-peer-reviewed sources","Mitigation":"Inclusion of non-peer-reviewed sources while maintaining quality assessment criteria","Technologies":"Quality assessment tools and criteria for non-peer-reviewed sources","People":"Researchers, academic institutions","Owner":"Researchers, academic institutions"}]}
